column4: Anyone tell me how to stop seeing the entrance and exits of everyone when I use gaim for IRC?
Gnomefreak: that build-dep option in apt-get worked like a charm! I will have to remember that one for the future.
Gnomefreak: I also have to build XMame from source. It is of course not listed in the APT via synaptic will the build-dep option work at all?
